testsuite.name: com.coffee.api.CoffeeTest

testcase.name: API returns 404 when an invalid ID param is sent on GET request()

testsuite.system-out:
***** REQUEST: GET: /coffees/byId/0 ***** GET /coffees/byId/0 HTTP/1.1
15:39:04.139 [Test worker] DEBUG Exposed -- SELECT coffee.id, coffee."name", roastercoffee.id, roastercoffee.roaster_id, roastercoffee.coffee_id, roaster.id, roaster."name", roaster.url, roaster.address FROM coffee INNER JOIN roastercoffee ON coffee.id = roastercoffee.coffee_id INNER JOIN roaster ON roaster.id = roastercoffee.roaster_id WHERE coffee.id = 0 ***** RESPONSE 404 to GET: /coffees/byId/0 ***** HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
